name: Doku
description:
This is my entry to the GDU Jim Jam (my first game jam entry). 

Duko is a little prototype of a game inspired by one of my favourite puzzlers 'Sokuban' . There are only 5 levels at this stage.  Enjoy!

Jim

UPDATE: On Windows Machines you may need to copy the contents of the ZIP file to a local folder. Or you can play online at this URL http://jimsapps.com.au/doku/.

Thanks
